body.name: Aleavia Purifying Facial Cleanse – Fragrance-Free Organic & All-Natural Prebiotic, Vegan Face Wash – Nourish your Healthy Skin Microbiome – 8 oz.

features: GLOWING, HEALTHY SKIN - This revolutionary face cleanser does more than just remove surface impurities—it balances, nourishes, purifies, and plumps your skin with moisture to bring out the fresh, luminous complexion that you’ve been dreaming of. It safely and gently removes makeup, plus it’s safe for everyone in the family (even baby!)

PLANT-BASED - Our organic facial cleanse is made of 100% plant based ingredients that naturally exhibit healing properties towards your skin. Nutrient-rich Acadian sea kelp gives starving skin vital nourishment, organic extra-virgin coconut oil infuses your skin with moisture and soothing aloe vera purifies the skin. Whether you have acne-prone skin, sensitive skin, dry skin, oily skin, or sensitive skin, our all-natural face cleanser works with any skin type.

HEALING & PURIFYING PROPERTIES - When your skin shows disruptions such as acne, eczema, rosacea, sun spots, or premature aging, it’s crying out for balance. In addition to helping fight these disruptions, Aleavia’s Purifying Facial Cleanser gently and effectively sloughs off dead skin cells, toxins, and excess oil to bring your skin’s pH to its optimum level and relieve irritation. (Plus it leaves your skin feeling great!)

PARABEN-FREE, CLEANSING FACE WASH - Aleavia’s organic face wash contains no sodium benzoate, no sodium chloride, and no cocamidopropyl betaine. Derived from earth and ocean, the all-natural ingredients found in our facial cleanser are nothing like the toxic chemicals in man-made products from other face washes.
CLEAN, NOURISHED, SMOOTH SKIN - Here at Aleavia Skin Care, our top priority is making sure you are completely satisfied with our products. Let us know if there's anything wrong.

productInformation.value: #34,037 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #505 in Facial Cleansing Washes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I Love This Product!
reviews.reviewText: This is the 2nd bottle I’ve ordered, and I really love this product (my 1st bottle has lasted me over 5 months, and I still have quite a bit remaining in there!)I am pregnant so I had to stop my normal acne regimen, with all the harmful chemicals I was putting on my face. With hormones making my acne super flared up, I needed to find a natural option for an acne product that wouldn’t harm the baby and this is what was recommended online. It smells absolutely terrible (you get used to it), but it works GREAT. My acne has gotten SO much better since I became pregnant, and my skin doesn’t get irritated or dried out like it did when I used to use my normal acne products (I also live at high altitude so dry skin is always an issue).I would highly recommend this product for women who are expecting, or to anyone who is looking for a more natural product to ween off the expensive acne medicines that have a ton of chemicals. Like I said, this only costs $20, and the bottle has lasted me almost 6 months now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like that it's only 7 ingredients
reviews.reviewText: I feel good about using this. It suds up and makes my skin feel VERY clean. It's a bit stripping though which is totally fine because it's all natural and quite effective. That's what cream is for!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great for oily/sensitive skin.
reviews.reviewText: The scent is not my favorite, but I LOVE that there are not chemicals or harsh ingredients. I have VERY sensitive skin that gets acne prone around my period, and this face wash helps a lot. If you have very dry skin, I would probably stay away, but for normal to oily it's great. It washes away easily and really does the trick. It seems to last a long time as well. I like it a lot and would purchase it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean ingredients and a little goes a long way
reviews.reviewText: I have rosacea and very sensitive skin. I have tried many things ranging in price and this is by far the best face wash I have used. It’s technically not a soap which makes it great for me yet it leaves my skin feeling soft and clean without feeling dry. The bottle lasts me a couple of months too which is amazing as the bottle is $20. I feel that for what it does for my skin it’s totally worth it. And the ingredients are very clean and ethically sourced which is amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This is a pretty good product
reviews.reviewText: This is a pretty good product. When I use it, my face feels pretty clean yet not overly stripped. It never irritates my extremely sensitive skin. What drew me to it was the natural ingredients- no overly processed chemicals that will give you cancer. I see this as the perfect cleanser for normal and combo folks, but for my oily skin, I find I need more so I use this as a second cleanse after an oil cleanser. I'm pretty sure this product doesn't break me out, but it also isn't a miracle treatment for my acne. My only real gripe is it comes in plastic packaging. I would pay an upcharge to get sustainable packaging. Overall, I'm pretty sure I would purchase this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Leaves your face feeling soft and not dry.
reviews.reviewText: Have never had a cleanser that removes all makeup so easily (just keep your eyes closed to remove mascara). It only takes a small amount. I am older woman and my skin has no dryness from this product.This is my favorite facial cleanser ever! MW

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I love this face wash. A little bit goes a long way. It removes all my makeup & sweat. The only downside is that It does sting if you get it in your eyes. I'm willing to tolerate that, due to the fact it's such a clean product - love the simple ingredient list.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pure ingredients and takes off makeup
reviews.reviewText: I’ve really liked this cleanser and I’ve been through a lot. 1) It has pure ingredients which is important to me. 2) It takes off my makeup, eye makeup included, which is HUGE. And 3) it is still soothing and somewhat moisturizing to my skin. It’s not the best in the moisture department, but I still give 5 stars for the other benefits. I am a mid-30s mother with sensitive skin and this “green and clean” cleanser has done its job well.

This cleanser is AMAZING. Broke out in the first week but Google says it’s a “skin purge” where your skin is detoxifying from previous unnatural products. Cleared up in the second week or so and there’s no turning back!
